nodes.text: The Rueful Confession was a starship that had its test flight in 1 BBY. Tabor Seitaron, an Imperial captain who taught military history to cadets at Carida Academy, was among those on board during the flight. Four years later, when he took a shuttle to the Imperial II-class Star Destroyer Herald, Seitaron looked back at the test flight when trying to recollect the last time he had experienced artificial gravity.
The Rueful Confession was mentioned in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
